meta.title: About TechFlow - Our Story & Mission
meta.description: Learn about TechFlow's mission to transform businesses through innovative technology solutions.

props.headline: Our Story
props.story_content: Founded in 2020, TechFlow emerged from a simple belief: technology should empower businesses, not complicate them. Our founders, experienced engineers from leading tech companies, recognized the gap between cutting-edge innovation and practical business applications.
props.mission_statement: To democratize advanced technology and make it accessible to businesses of all sizes.

values.title: Innovation First
values.description: We stay ahead of technological trends to deliver tomorrow's solutions today.

values.title: Customer Success
values.description: Your success is our success. We measure our impact by your growth.

values.title: Transparency
values.description: Clear communication and honest partnerships in everything we do.
